DOC.brief_summary: This study is to compare the diagnostic accuracy of digital models obtained via 10 digitization techniques to the reference standard of orthodontic plaster model through dental measuremnets
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Accuracy of Digital Models Obtained Using Intraoral and Extraoral Scanners
DOC.criteria: adult patients seeking orthodontic treatment permanent dentition deciduous or mixed dentition cleft lip and palate patients
